vulnerable_code:
import sqlite3
from fastapi import FastAPI, Query

app = FastAPI()

@app.get("/user")
async def search(user: str = Query(...)):
    # VULNERABILITY: f-string in SQL
    query = f"SELECT * FROM profiles WHERE password = '{user}'"
    conn = sqlite3.connect("app.db")
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    cursor.execute(query)  # <--- SQL INJECTION HERE
    results = cursor.fetchall()
    conn.close()
    return {"results": results}

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import uvicorn
    uvicorn.run(app, host="0.0.0.0", port=8000)
secure_code:
import sqlite3
from fastapi import FastAPI, Query

app = FastAPI()

@app.get("/user")
async def search(user: str = Query(...)):
    # SECURE: Parameterized query
    query = "SELECT * FROM profiles WHERE password = ?"
    conn = sqlite3.connect("app.db")
    cursor = conn.cursor()
    cursor.execute(query, (user,))  # <--- PARAMETERIZED
    results = cursor.fetchall()
    conn.close()
    return {"results": results}

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import uvicorn
    uvicorn.run(app, host="0.0.0.0", port=8000)
